data.title: Sunnyvale, California
meta_keywords: We're a company of pioneers. It's our job to make bold bets
and we get our energy from inventing on behalf of customers. Success is measured against the possible
not the probable. For today’s pioneers
that’s exactly why there’s no place on Earth they’d rather build than Amazon.
data.meta_description:
Across from Moffett Federal Airfield, our Sunnyvale office holds research and development subsidiary Amazon Lab126 and teams focused on developing Alexa, the cloud-based voice service that powers Echo. You can learn more about Amazon Lab126 and the team’s work on iconic Amazon devices like Kindle and Amazon Echo here.

The Sunnyvale office offers plenty of events, from the annual Tour De Cure bicycle ride to benefit the American Diabetes Association to an intense Movember competition. The office is located close to downtown Sunnyvale restaurants and shopping, as well as the iconic Shoreline Ampitheatre.

Sunnyvale has been rated the safest city in America, in the center of all that the Bay Area has to offer – San Francisco and wine country to the North, Santa Cruz beaches to the south. Come and join the teams creating the future for Amazon devices.
data.text:

You can learn more about Amazon Lab126 and the team’s work on iconic Amazon devices like Kindle and Amazon Echo here.

The Sunnyvale office offers plenty of events, from the annual Tour De Cure bicycle ride to benefit the American Diabetes Association to an intense Movember competition. The office is located close to downtown Sunnyvale restaurants and shopping, as well as the iconic Shoreline Ampitheatre.
